title: Dynamite

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Plant a Bomb at someone's house.
-Defuse a Bomb.
-Detonate a Bomb.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Defusing a Bomb deactivates the Bomb.
-You may only have one active Bomb at all time.
-Detonating a Bomb deals a powerful rampage attack.
